column2: "Yo <%me>, I saw your fighting just now."
"You seem to have picked up some skill from Zeno, but you're still just getting along."
"You falter too much in your fighting. You lack the will of absolutely destroying your enemy."
"That's why they don't fear you and it takes longer."
"The will to kill anyone who stands in front of you; anyone on the battlefield without that is just an idiot."
"Those kinds of idiots are the ones who always mess up at the most important times."
"Killing anything in front of you without thinking; that will make you stronger."
"I guess that now is what you'd call advice."
"It's rare for Master Gettemhart to look at anyone like that. I'm kind of jealous."
"Sina, what the hell are you rambling about? Hurry your ass up!"
"Forget what I just said. Now if you'll excuse me."
